feed.title: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org
feed.subtitle: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org on GitHub

entry.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle SSRF Vulnerability
entry.content:
Moodle 3.x has Server Side Request Forgery in the filepicker.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2018-1042
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=364381
  • http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/153766/Moodle-Filepicker-3.5.2-Server-Side-Request-Forgery.html
  • https://github.com/moodle/moodle/commit/f1d1a60e0ac8549c08e66062f3cd0110e4a92e24
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20210124134113/http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/102752
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-qqjv-mc2v-p7mc

entry.title: [zendframework/zendframework] Zend Framework Allows SQL Injection
entry.content:
The (1) order and (2) group methods in Zend_Db_Select in the Zend Framework before 1.12.19 might allow remote attackers to conduct SQL injection attacks via vectors related to use of the character pattern [\w]* in a regular expression.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2016-6233
  • https://framework.zend.com/security/advisory/ZF2016-02
  • https://lists.fedoraproject.org/archives/list/package-announce@lists.fedoraproject.org/message/2JUKFTI6ABK7ZN7IEAGPCLAHCFANMID2/
  • https://lists.fedoraproject.org/archives/list/package-announce@lists.fedoraproject.org/message/N27AV6AL6B4KGEP3VIMIHQ5LFAKF5FTU/
  • https://lists.fedoraproject.org/archives/list/package-announce@lists.fedoraproject.org/message/UR5HXNGIUSSIZKMSZYMPBEPZEZTYFTIT/
  • https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201804-10
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20210123152547/http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/91802
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-p9hp-3gpv-52w3

entry.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle Unauthenticated Access
entry.content:
In Moodle 2.x and 3.x, the question engine allows access to files that should not be available.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2016-8642
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=343275
  • https://github.com/moodle/moodle/commit/cf0b9432d81ba9d5763e4894f82c95ca9fbf548f
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20210123193602/http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/94441
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-x32v-7qw8-cpq8

entry.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle sensitive information disclosure
entry.content:
In Moodle 2.x and 3.x, an unenrolled user still receives event monitor notifications even though they can no longer access the course.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2016-5014
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=336699
  • https://github.com/moodle/moodle/commit/ea106d2a1dbc633a22f12a119763b2af5f33542b
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20210123154548/http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/92042
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-c4cq-v4wp-28hg

entry.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle Does Not Escape Characters In Email Headers
entry.content:
In Moodle 2.x and 3.x, text injection can occur in email headers, potentially leading to outbound spam.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2016-5013
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=336698
  • https://github.com/moodle/moodle/commit/ed63718caa48803843a14140d8a27f04aba9c8c4
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20210123154543/http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/92040
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-2hh3-jmv8-5fmx

entry.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle sensitive information disclosure
entry.content:
The capability check to access other badges in Moodle 3.0 through 3.0.3, 2.9 through 2.9.5, 2.8 through 2.8.11, 2.7 through 2.7.13, and earlier allows remote authenticated users to read the badges of other users.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2016-3732
  • https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1335933
  • http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/05/17/4
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20210413170947/http://www.securitytracker.com/id/1035902
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-5282-96ff-xx3h
